alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:38PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with gusty winds will impact portions of central Goshen County through 515 PM MDT... At 438 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Veteran, or 13 miles west of Torrington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Torrington, Lingle, Yoder and Veteran. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
